name: Gluttony: EXTRA Vegan Edition
description:
GLUTTONY: EXTRA Vegan Edition - COW MILK IS MEANT FOR COW BABIES!

You BETTER not eat meat and dairy or you WILL disgrace yourself! Avoid gluten like the plague and aim for healthier options like Brussels sprouts and carrots to earn points and achieve immortality.

Worst case scenario you’ll have a great time playing this game and best case you’ll finally drop those hard-to-shake inhumane habits of yours and change your life for the better. Either way this game will prove a net plus for your life.

This is a hyper casual endless game where you have to collect (eat) vegetables and avoid non-vegan junk food, with a progressively increasing difficulty.

This is meant to be an offiline, hyper-casual, mobile game, designed to kill your time so expect the dimensions to resemble a phone (in full 4K). For the full mobile experience you can download the app on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.panteliskassotis.gluttonyvegan

PC Controls:

  • Arrows or WASD - Moving
  • Mouse - Menu interactions
  • Alt+Enter - Toggle fullscreend
  • Escape - Exit game

Please note that the game price allows us to keep the experience free of ads and microtransactions. Pay once, keep it forever. The way it used to be.  We even added some extra content to show our appreciation. The mobile version of the game on Google Play (iOS coming soon) is free of charge!

Be sure to check out "GLUTTONY: Vanilla Edition" for Android, Windows, Linux and macOS!
